actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-368.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3722) to extend until December 14, 1985, the application of certain tobacco excise taxes, trade adjustment assistance, certain medicare reimbursement provisions, and borrowing authority under the railroad unemployment insurance program.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3722 (tobacco tax, trade adjustment assistance, Medicare, and railroad unemployment insurance provision extensions).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3722) to extend until December 14, 1985, the application of certain tobacco excise taxes, trade adjustment assistance, certain medicare reimbursement provisions, and borrowing authority under the railroad unemployment insurance program.
